DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study and will evaluate IOP reduction in newly diagnosed patients with POAG or OHT. All care (including treatment and diagnostic procedures) provided is at the discretion of the participating physicians according to their clinical judgment and the local standard of medical care.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Reduction in Newly Diagnosed Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OHT)
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed with primary open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
